(mounted [mounted], pierce-resistant [pierceres], undead [undead], inanimate [inanimate], no-move-penalty-for-armor [nomovepen], trample [trample], need-not-eat [neednoteat], mindless [mind], does-not-heal-naturally [noheal], spirit-sight [spiritsight])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, 2 misc
When a King was entombed, he was always buried with his retinue of servants and warriors. Tomb Chariots are chariots of the dead pulled by skeletal lizards, emerging from the tombs of ancient kings to wage war on the enemies of the Sacred Kingdom.
